Submodules

src.models.predict_model module

src.models.predict_model.predict()

Retrieves the trained XGBClassifier and processed data and predicts the label. Saves the predictions in a csv

src.models.train_model module

src.models.train_model.train_and_save_xgb(n_jobs, cv, scoring)

Train the XGBBoost and save the model - Loads the pipeline, Retrieve the processed data

Parameters

  • nb_jobs (int) – Number of jobs

  • cv (int) – The cross-validator

  • scoring (str) – metric used to score the model
